GSD.description:
ipv6: Fix signed integer overflow in __ip6_append_data

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 84dc940890e91e42898e4443a093281702440abf. For more details please see the references link.
